=== Technical Contacts ===

These are technical contacts for issues related to a particular language, script or fonts. These can be people in translation teams or external contacts.

This list will be used to contact the teams or persons when issues related to their area of expertise in localization arise. If they have an account or belong to a team in Launchpad, they will be subscribed to particular bugs when they are filed.

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| '''Language'''
| '''Launchpad Team'''
| '''Contact'''
| '''Area of expertise'''
|-
| Chinese, Japanese, Korean
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-cjk-testers|Ubuntu CJK Testers]]</nowiki>
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-cjk-testers|Ubuntu CJK Testers]]</nowiki>
| Fonts, scripts, related to CJK (Chinese-Japanese-Korean)
|-
| Galician
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-l10n-gl]]</nowiki>
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~frandieguez|Fran Diéguez]]</nowiki>
| Fonts, scripts, related to Galician language
